name: Roboute Guilliman
description: Primarch of the Ultramarines and Lord Commander of the Imperium.

name: Abaddon the Despoiler
description: Warmaster of Chaos and leader of the Black Legion.

name: Commander Farsight
description: Renegade Tau commander wielding the Dawn Blade.

name: Saint Celestine
description: Living saint of the Adepta Sororitas with miraculous powers.

name: Ghazghkull Mag Uruk Thraka
description: The most powerful Ork Warlord in the galaxy.

name: Trazyn the Infinite
description: A Necron Overlord and obsessive collector of rare artifacts.

name: Magnus the Red
description: Primarch of the Thousand Sons and powerful sorcerer of Tzeentch.

name: Sanguinius
description: Angel-winged Primarch of the Blood Angels, slain at Terra.

name: Inquisitor Eisenhorn
description: Imperial Inquisitor known for walking the edge of heresy.

name: Mortarion
description: Daemon Primarch of the Death Guard, champion of Nurgle.
